summary: Guard UI Profile Access and Photo Lightbox Modal testing complete. All 9 features verified successfully. Guard can access profile via clickable avatar and User icon button. Profile editing works correctly. Photo lightbox modal opens with zoom icon on hover, shows full-size image with user info overlay and close button.
passed_tests: Guard UI header shows clickable avatar (data-testid='guard-profile-avatar') - PASS
Guard UI has profile button (User icon, data-testid='guard-profile-btn') in header - PASS
Clicking profile button navigates to /profile - PASS
Guard can access their own profile page at /profile - PASS
Guard can edit their profile (name, phone, description) - PASS
Profile save shows success message 'Perfil actualizado correctamente' - PASS
Avatar shows zoom icon on hover when photo exists - PASS
Profile photo click opens lightbox modal - PASS
Lightbox modal shows full-size image (data-testid='photo-modal-image') - PASS
Lightbox modal has close button (data-testid='photo-modal-close-btn') - PASS
Lightbox modal shows user info overlay at bottom with name and role badge - PASS
Close button closes the lightbox modal - PASS
Avatar click does NOT open modal when no photo exists (correct behavior) - PASS
Other users can view Guard profile in read-only mode via /profile/:guardUserId - PASS
Read-only mode shows 'Volver' back button - PASS
Read-only mode does NOT show Edit button - PASS
Read-only mode shows 'Perfil de Usuario' title instead of 'Mi Perfil' - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: Guard UI header implementation is correct with clickable avatar and profile button
Profile page correctly handles both own profile (editable) and other user's profile (read-only)
Photo lightbox modal implementation follows best practices with proper data-testid attributes
Zoom icon hover effect only appears when profile photo exists (correct UX)
User info overlay in lightbox shows name and role badges correctly
Multi-tenant validation works - users can only view profiles within their condominium
seed_data_creation: Used existing demo data guards (guarda1, guarda2). Updated guarda1 profile with test photo for lightbox testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Guard UI profile access fully verified. GuardUI.js header has clickable avatar (data-testid='guard-profile-avatar') and profile button (data-testid='guard-profile-btn') that both navigate to /profile. ProfilePage.js handles photo lightbox modal with data-testid='photo-modal-image' and data-testid='photo-modal-close-btn'. Zoom icon appears on avatar hover only when photo exists. /profile/:userId route shows read-only view with 'Volver' back button.

photo_lightbox_modal.trigger: Click on avatar when photo exists
